channel.title: Yet Aother Useless Blog (YAUB)
channel.description: TechBlog about OpenShift 4.x and other solutions

item.title: DO410 Ansible and Ansible Tower training notes
item.description: Notes taken during the DO410 online training course

item.title: OpenShift 4 and Service Mesh 6 - Advanced Routing Example
item.description: OpenShift 4.x and Service Mesh/istio Tutorial 6 - Advanced Routing. Try routing traffic based on canary, mirroring or loadbalancing traffic.

item.title: Openshift 4 and Service Mesh 5 - Routing Example
item.description: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh/Istio Tutorial 5 - Routing Examples. Learn about routing and create your first definitions for VirtualService and DefaultRule

item.title: Helpful oc / kubectl commands
item.description: Openshift 4.x - Collection of usefull oc/kubectl commands.

item.title: Openshift 4 and Service Mesh 4 - Ingress with custom domain
item.description: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh/Istio Tutorial 4 - Use a custom domain to get your traffic into your Service Mesh

item.title: Openshift 4 and ServiceMesh 3 - Ingress Traffic
item.description: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh/Istio Tutorial 3 - Get traffic into your Service Mesh and use Kiali to make your traffic visible.

item.title: Openshift 4 and ServiceMesh 1 - Installation
item.description: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh/Istio Tutorial 1 - Installation and First Steps

item.title: Openshift 4 and ServiceMesh 2 - Deploy Microservices
item.description: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh/Istio Tutorial 2 - Deploy some example microservices, which are used in future tutorials.
